text: The 1921 Geneva Covenanters football team represented the Geneva College during the 1921 college football season. The head coach was Philip Henry Bridenbaugh, coaching the team in his sixth year. The team finished the season with a final record of 5–3–1. ==Schedule== ==References== Geneva Category:Geneva Golden Tornadoes football seasons Geneva Covenanters football
title: 1921 Geneva Covenanters football team
